creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Maslon
inscription: UR: 秋奥 {Shūō} (mid Autumn); 37 haiku poems about autumn
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper with silver
text: This lotus design was originally published in 1793 as part of an untitled haiku album (see British Museum 1979, 0305, 0.169 or Metropolitan Museum of Art 2013.876).
title: Lotus
